website_summaries.verdict: Ergonomically designed, this electric carving knife set lets you slice through thick meats and breads without the accompanying pain of a manual knife.
pros: Removable stainless steel blade for cutting
Includes specialty cutting tip for areas that are hard to carve
Comes with storage case and carving fork
cons: Blades do not always stay locked into the knife

customer_reviews.title: Had to return it
customer_reviews.text: This product is not consistent with other Oster products I own. I bought this to replace my electric knife because my newly married daughter borrowed the one I got as a wedding gift over 20 years ago and still works like a champ. This one doesn't come close to the quality of my old trusty knife. The knife became hot, and smelled of electrical wires burning as I tried to cut both boneless ham and an eye round roast. The meat was slipping in between the blades, something I had never experienced with my old knife. Needless to say, I had to ask my daughter for my knife back.
customer_reviews.author: REBCON

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as well as my 15 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not work as well as my 15 year old RIVAL knife. It seems to "SHRED" the meat. The knife blades are hard to insert. They are not stable...they come loose and fall out!!! DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. IT IS WORTHLESS. Oster should be embarrassed and ashamed to present this product to the public!!! BOUGHT 4 OF THESE AS CHRISTMAS GIFTS ....I am extremely embarrassed! My 15 year old RIVAL electric knife still works MUCH BETTER than this piece of JUNK!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: maura d

customer_reviews.title: The knife looks good, but it didn't cut/slice the ham at all
customer_reviews.text: The knife looks good, but it didn't cut/slice the ham at all. I notice there was a gap between the blades and the meat would get in this gap an spread the blades apart even more. When I removed the blades from the handle the blades would be against each other, but when I installed them in the handle they would seperate when the clicked into the holder latch. The knife wasn't usable at all. Maybe I just got a bad one??
customer_reviews.author: Dan_D

customer_reviews.title: I was extremely disappointed. It would NOT CUT
customer_reviews.text: BUMMER, I just cooked a turkey looking forward to using my new knife. I was extremely disappointed. It would NOT CUT! It just sat their on the breast meat making meat dust. I read others have had meat between the blades; I did, also. Not sure what that means except it puts distance between the two blades. I got out my 30 year old dull knife which did the job! I noticed right away the old one had Much More Power! Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: jack Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: It cuts 2 inch thick memory foam well.
customer_reviews.text: My mom has a heated cushion in her truck with a battery pack that's very uncomfortable to sit on. I"m making her an Alligator Annie cushion for her truck out of an old memory foam mattress pad that should also help her see over the steering wheel finally. She bought this truck for the loud pipes and has trouble seeing over the dash. She's a 75 year old teenager on the road constantly. And yes, she is the Alligator Annie. I found my other electric knife shortly after I used this one. The case I will repurpose for something else since the knife wont fit with the blade in.
customer_reviews.author: N. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the poorest excuse for an electric knife I have seen or used. The blades are not very sharp, the handle gets so hot when I sliced two (2) loaves of home-made bread, that it was hard to hold it in my hand. Also, the blades do not fit together very well. I am not at all pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: GUNNY

customer_reviews.title: I like the storage case and the included fork
customer_reviews.text: I bought the electric knife to carve the thanksgiving turkey and it worked very well. I like the storage case and the included fork. It made slicing the breast meat especially easy, there was no difficulty getting the skin cut even with the meat slices.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Jette Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I'm late in sending this review. I now have a lot of time on my hands due to the virus. The electric knife lasted all about 2 months. Since I was out of the 30 day window couldn't send it back. The issue is it will not cut for some strange reason. Blades are installed properly. When you go to cut for instance a turkey, it will not. I can't tell why except maybe the blades are not moving quickly enough...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t listen to the other reviews. Don’t make the same mistake. While cutting just the second loaf of bread it quit working. If you’re looking to cut just one loaf of bread this knife is for you. If you plan on using it for longer, choose another knife. I was so frustrated I just threw it out without returning. What a disappointment!!’ There needs to be a zero star for this one .....
customer_reviews.author: tina conner

customer_reviews.title: New Oster Electric Knife
customer_reviews.text: At Thanksgiving my sister discovered her electric knife was lost. This is the replacement. I won't get a full report until Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Jim H.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and a breeze to keep clean!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my daughter-in-law. She loved it! The case is very durable and stores all the accessories very well. They won't be moving around in the case! I also know the quality of the vender's product has always been reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Karen DeRoche

customer_reviews.title: Just save yourself the hassle....... don’t buy.....junk!
customer_reviews.text: This won’t cut through butter. Ordered this just to slice my Easter roast beef since butcher slicer was out of order. No way would it cut the beef. Needless to say we had to slice it with one of our own knives. So disgusted with this knife. Comes in nice carrier with fork.....looks nice. But looks are deceiving. Do not buy this knife. I threw away the carton and shipping box. But you can bet I will be on the phone Monday calling Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: gls

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice knife for the price
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice knife for the price, but it is not as strong as I expected. I felt like I was going to burn it up just slicing a boneless pork tenderloin. If I used it more often, I would probably buy a different one that was more heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Knife
customer_reviews.text: Needed a replacement electric knife. This model was great: had a case, easy to use and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Otto D. Libener

customer_reviews.title: do ot buy
customer_reviews.text: worst knife ever the blades fall out of the knife while you are cutting the meat builds up between the blades and fall apart or out.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Good price, just not sharp
customer_reviews.text: Is not sharp at all-gave as a gift has to take it to knife sharpener because it was like sawing the meat not slicing it.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Peggy Giron

customer_reviews.title: It did not work for my Thanksgiving dinner!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time to carve the Thanksgiving turkey, ....unfortunately could not use it because the knife pieces would not interlock properly enough to stabilize for carving. Put it back in the box after 15 minutes and used a regular knife.....
customer_reviews.author: Lavonia s Tisdale

customer_reviews.title: under powered!
customer_reviews.text: It took me forever to even cut up a pineapple! I wouldnt buy this again, way under powered.
customer_reviews.author: Maree McRae

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Broke during cutting meat. Waste of money. Just spend the extra dollars for a good one that will last a lot longer than this pos.
customer_reviews.author: Noni

customer_reviews.title: Knife cuts great!
customer_reviews.text: This replaced another brand knife that wore out. This new one is great. It is comfortable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Fox

customer_reviews.title: Cutting It Well!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and easy to use. Easy to clean and sanitize.
customer_reviews.author: Kdj Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cut corn off the cob. Burned up after 30 minutes. Got to hot it burned my son's hand. No fan to cool down the motor. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Jones

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Nice handle but my blade was DULL and unusable. Will have to find a replacement blade or return.
customer_reviews.author: Debra C. Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Oster products
customer_reviews.text: Works flawlessly. Nice knife. Hope it lasts as long as my 20 year old Hamilton Beach did.
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: I gave this knife to my daughter as a gift and was embarrassed as it would be better for cutting butter
customer_reviews.text: Used it once so I can't return it. Tried to cut a ham and gave up and used a regular knife! I gave this knife to my daughter as a gift and was embarrassed as it would be better for cutting butter. I have a electric knife and never had a problem. I would not recommend this knife to anyone unless you were cutting JELLO!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Great product, got it to replace my old worn ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, got it to replace my old worn out one. Works perfect and I use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Albert B.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Trying to use this knife to cut ham‘s or turkeys is useless. This is one of the worst consumer products I’ve ever purchased I had an electric knife from Oster and used it for almost 25 years before the plastic broke. This electric knife is destined for the trashcan. The blades are difficult to insert and when you tried to use it to cut It’s like trying to use a butter knife
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Broke first time used. Cutting boneless prime rib. Blades continue to fall out when cutting. Guests waiting so Finished using a regular knife. I hade an older model for 34 years it just fell apart. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kathy from Okauchee

customer_reviews.title: This knife gets very hot.
customer_reviews.text: The very first time I used the knife I cut corn off the cob to freeze. It got sooo hot you couldn’t even touch the back of the knife. It also smelled electrically hot. I always read reviews and I did not for this purchase going on the name brand. I wish I would have. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: J det

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to do.....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this knife to cut brownies & bar cookies that would be mangled by cutting with a regular knife. When you bake, the edges in your pan can get hard and trying to cut with a regular serrated knife can squish the baked goods. This works to make the cuts "prettier", but it does take some pressure to force it through the edges. I assume, with a softer product like a turkey or ham, pressure would not be required, but I haven't used it for that yet!
customer_reviews.author: H. Stern

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap....will not cut. Smells like it is on fire when you try to use it. Shame on Oster.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son for Thanksgiving. He loved it... Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my uncle and he said it wouldn’t cut the ham he made.
customer_reviews.author: T&L Gardner

customer_reviews.title: True disappointment
customer_reviews.text: True disappointment, we just tried it out cutting a corn beef and rather than slicing , it just hacked its way through. Just seemed to work very poorly against our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: john m coffey

customer_reviews.title: Adequate
customer_reviews.text: Works good but wish it was a little stronger... did the job and it’s reasonable priced
customer_reviews.author: Donna Mckee

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality knife
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and the case makes it convenient to store.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Stebbins

customer_reviews.title: Cuts great
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved this knife. She had been wanting one. She said it cut through our brisket and Boston butt like butter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 50/50 one good,one bad
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these last year, one for meld and other for my son. My son loves his and uses it often. Yesterday, Thanksgiving, was first time I attempted to use mine and I couldn't get it to slice the turkey,it was shredding it. So my son tried and he said something is wrong with the blades on mine because his cuts meat perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D. Francis

customer_reviews.title: Good, with reservations.
customer_reviews.text: The knife is easy to hold and I love the storage case. My only concern is that the first time I used it - to slice up a watermelon - the motor got quite hot. I hope cutting a turkey or roast won't be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Bibliophile

customer_reviews.title: Great electric knife!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great electric knife for a very reasonable cost. I love using it to slice up my sandwich bread since I bake 4 to 6 loaves at a time. I pre-slice it and then freeze my sliced bread in plastic bags. It takes me no time to slice the breads where slicing with a regular bread knife took me forever! Great for carving meat as well.
customer_reviews.author: EJMcDonald

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed about the interior of the box
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed about the interior of the box, where the blades need to be stored. It was very cheap. Other than that, the knife is fantastic, excellent for bread and meats.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Pike

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Whether your carving a roast or shaping foam rubber for your drag queen costumes, this carver is the right one for you! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally inferior product
customer_reviews.text: Need hands of steel to push blades through shredded turkey; too hot to hold after 2 minutes!! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Vita

customer_reviews.title: Good, but hot
customer_reviews.text: This knife works very well, but boy, does it heat up fast! I had to take two breaks cutting one loaf of bread to let it cool down. Otherwise it is a very nice knife.
customer_reviews.author: wavymouse

customer_reviews.title: Hasn't been used yet
customer_reviews.text: Was bought as a gift. Not sure of how well it works
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Electric knife
customer_reviews.text: It needs to have a button to keep it running so you don't have to hold in the on button the one I had before had this feature
customer_reviews.author: Rodney LAKES

customer_reviews.title: Simple and elegant, does its job perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed; this knife works perfectly. The meat fork seems to be pretty low quality, after only 1 use and washing, the handle has a bit of loose play to it. It is still perfectly functional, thanks to the full tang construction, but it would be nice not to have a wiggle in the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: I would certainly recommend this quality knife to anyone !
customer_reviews.text: We just used our Oster electric knife last night to slice our flank steak. This knife is very well made, comes with a carving fork and a very nice case for storing! It is very well made and we are very pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Fields

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to use because you have to leave your ...
customer_reviews.text: Too hard to use because you have to leave your thumb on the button without removing it. Having arthritis makes it impossible to use.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: We have to work to get the blades to set in the unit correctly. It does not slice bread well. Other than that, it is way better than the Hamilton Beach model we had.
customer_reviews.author: COQUILLIAN

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift. My daughter likes it. I have not used it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: loved that it had a case
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to slice home baked bread, loved that it had a case, but after 2 uses, it would no longer go through the loaf without smashing it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Returned knife for refund
customer_reviews.text: The knife was most unsatisfactory. Heated up after minimal use, carved poorly. Returned knife for refund. I was very suprised that such a well known and respected company could put their name on such a defective product.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad P. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: After using once it broke
customer_reviews.text: Used it once & it broke. I would like to return.
customer_reviews.author: shamsheesh suhas

customer_reviews.title: Works great & the case keeps it all together
customer_reviews.text: Works great & the case keeps it all together. I cut up a tri-tip paper thin. Then the next week I used it to cut up an old foam mattress pad to fit in the trash, cut through like butter. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: victor williams

customer_reviews.title: Blades activate but don’t cut.
customer_reviews.text: We used this knife for slicing mea one time. It worked nicely but the second time it did not slice. It came on but the blades wouldn’t cut.can it be returned after using?
customer_reviews.author: jane mansfield

customer_reviews.title: This knife will not cut butter. Did not try ...
customer_reviews.text: This knife will not cut butter. Did not try it out until a month later at a function. It would not cut the meat at all. Wish I had used it earlier so I could return them.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Clay

customer_reviews.title: The blades are dull. The blades come apart at the top consistently
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this knife. It has no cutting power. The blades are dull. The blades come apart at the top consistently. The blades are hard to insert. This knife had one job to do and it failed.
customer_reviews.author: Parent

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works great! Used it to cut up brisket without it I would have been in trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Blaylock

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only thing is the knife part come a lose sometimes when cutting
customer_reviews.author: Rdcool

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Used knife once at Christmas. Worked fine. Tried for second time today. Fell apart blades won’t stsy in.
customer_reviews.author: CHERYL CATES

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Used this item one time and it burned up... blades kept falling out while using.
customer_reviews.author: Ltlgrly

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gifts. Recipients did not like. Difficult to use. Did not cut evenly.
customer_reviews.author: LPitts

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Very good Sharp Knife. It all that I had hoped that it do.
customer_reviews.author: Ted M.

customer_reviews.title: It's loud and something that doesn't cut very well
customer_reviews.text: Basically the same exact knife as the Black & Decker I bought from you which broke
customer_reviews.author: robert  fedeshen

customer_reviews.title: So So
customer_reviews.text: I suppose this knife may work on meat but definitely NOT for anything like a Pineapple! Got hot while using it and it had no power or any ease during the process of slicing the pineapple...a BIG disappointment given the brand name!
customer_reviews.author: diAnnH717

customer_reviews.title: Terrible knife
customer_reviews.text: It was crap that burned up the third time I used it. Threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Looked like the item had been used and the inside box was broken; returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: Not costly but save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Save your money on this one! Blades are flimsy and dull. If you push hard to get through the meat, the blades fall out! Pass on this one and look for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Shear

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and easy to operate. So easy that I even trusted my husband to cut the turkey.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: ... for a gift but I no It is the best.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift but I no It is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great shape. A great buy for the price..
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne.

customer_reviews.title: I don't like how the blades allows meat to get between them ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't like how the blades allows meat to get between them and creates a gap and thus reduces the cutting ability.
customer_reviews.author: Van Howard

customer_reviews.title: LOUSY PRODUCT DEFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: Lousy. It's a shame we waited until Easter to try it. First when we put the blades in it wouldn't cut anything. After I took the blades out & put them back in I had to push them back & forth to even get a connection. After all this when I went to slice the Ham it barely cut. A lousy produce. Now Amazon's policy says I can't return it. I've placed hundreds of orders, and never returning a defective item before this. I will really have to measure whether it's worth buying more on Amazon, especially small appliances.
customer_reviews.author: AOM

customer_reviews.title: Knife does not work correctly
customer_reviews.text: Knife did not work correctly - knife blades pulsed in the same direction, at the same time, instead of alternating as blades normally would on an electric knife. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Allison and Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Works GREAT for carving foam, which is what I got it for.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Collins

customer_reviews.title: then everything will be fine. It just the blades are dull and
customer_reviews.text: Amazon please contact me. All I want for this product is some new cutting blades, then everything will be fine. It just the blades are dull and beent
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not a good choice. Does not cut well al all. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Marsha S. Rosenstein

customer_reviews.title: This is the second knife we received that has not ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second knife we received that has not worked properly. The first knife that was shipped did not work at all and the second that was shipped worked for one use.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley C.

customer_reviews.title: good price and came with a storage case
customer_reviews.text: Works well, good price and came with a storage case.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph  Reardon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing knife and love being able to store it in the case!
customer_reviews.author: Debra M.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This knife could hardly slice a tri- tip roast. It doesn't have a basic safety blade stopper.
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: the Blade don't slide meat get stuck between blade would ...
customer_reviews.text: the Blade don't slide meat get stuck between blade would not buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: make sure it is what you want
customer_reviews.text: Everything That I have Purchased has been what I have wanted and received in time
customer_reviews.author: Reddog

customer_reviews.title: Zero stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: No! This electric knife does NOT cut meat. Horrible, zero stars. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: the grip was good but the cutting power wasn't that good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Trigger on top (instead of underneath) is difficult to use because grip is not as firm.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a replacement gift for my husband and he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Shoecrazy

customer_reviews.title: Amazon does it again.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time for a Christmas gift and was used Christmas day, what a great gift and a perfect set.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G. Novelli

customer_reviews.title: Free Delivery took to Long😱
customer_reviews.text: After waiting patiently for the free delivery that took nearly two weeks, I had the opportunity to use the knife today on a small 31/2 pound Tri-Tip. I sliced it up in about 4 minutes. It doesn't have the greatest torque but is a reasonably priced quality electric knife.🇺🇸
customer_reviews.author: H. Hammer

customer_reviews.title: good thing I bought 2 than I can switch off
customer_reviews.text: The motor gets too hot . good thing I bought 2 than I can switch off.
customer_reviews.author: ELLEN ROUX

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The Rt. blade will not stay in when cutting meat.
customer_reviews.author: Harry E Bufford

customer_reviews.title: Terrible experience. Knife blade would unlock when operating knife
customer_reviews.text: Terrible experience. Knife blade would unlock when operating knife. On the one occasion when it didn't unlock, the knife would barely cut through the roast that I was trying to cut which was very tender. Total disaster.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Lisitski

customer_reviews.title: Contains LEAD in the cord
customer_reviews.text: Contains LEAD in the cord...instructions indicate to "wash hands after handling cord". What sense does it make to cut my food with something I have to wash my hands after handling?
customer_reviews.author: dono2012

customer_reviews.title: get a better product.
customer_reviews.text: Lousy. Spend more, get a better product...I am going to do that in the future....
customer_reviews.author: Series Fan

customer_reviews.title: The worst! Blades fall out while carving
customer_reviews.text: The worst! Blades fall out while carving. Stuck with it now because missed return date . Got to buy another 😱
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: make carving the Sunday roast a breeze
customer_reviews.text: The only negative is the electric cord is awkward otherwise carving meat is like a hot knife through butter. It takes practise to achieve assurance and a nice degree of neatness. Recomend practice on an uncut loaf of bread
customer_reviews.author: Tramp

customer_reviews.title: Superior to Hamilton Beach, Well-Designed Knife
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a Hamilton Beach first and sent it back because of its poor ergonomic design. We then purchased the Oster. All the difference in the world.While it is a bit heavy, it is well designed, easy to use, and ergonomically proper with appropriate consideration to human factors. Unlike the Hamilton Beach, it does not tear up the meat as much because of the spacing between the knives.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor cutting power. I had to assist the operation of the knife by using a sawing motion with my hand in order to cut a piece of beef. The power button is on the top of this device which caused my thumb to be sore during the operation. I have since returned this item and would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: MommaP2

customer_reviews.title: Like the button configuration, does its job
customer_reviews.text: I had a different brand with a index trigger. I hated the trigger, primarily due to the safety and how hard it was to operate. I really like the thumb button on this unit. It works in the same direction as the pressure you're applying. I find the shape good for my hand as well. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Compucidal

product_meta.title: Oster Electric knife, Black/Silver
product_meta.description: The art of carving is perfected with this electric knife. Blades slice with precision so you can serve with confidence. Ideal for entertaining. Includes carving fork and storage case. With the Oster brand, you can cook with passion and serve with pleasure.
feature_bullets: Custom storage case and fork included
Special cutting tip for hard to carve areas
Includes carving fork and storage case

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars511 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
